ontologies.title: French (Supreme) Court of Appeal Ontology
ontologies.description: This ontology represents the legal concepts and relationships associated with the French Supreme Court of Appeal. It captures various entities such as convictions, offences, facts, and personal attributes including marital status and age. The aim is to enable structured representation and reasoning about legal cases and events in the context of French law.

ontologies.title: Financial Securities Ontology
ontologies.description: The Financial Securities Ontology represents concepts related to financial securities, including debt securities, documents, filing types, financial reporting, and company information. It encompasses classes for financial metrics, company types, compliance status, risk factors, and shareholder information, facilitating the modeling and exchange of financial data. This ontology is applicable in financial reporting, investment analysis, regulatory compliance, and risk assessment.

ontology_addendum.title: Financial Securities Ontology
ontology_addendum.description: The Financial Securities Ontology represents concepts related to financial securities, including debt securities, documents, filing types, financial reporting, and company information. It encompasses classes for financial metrics, company types, compliance status, risk factors, and shareholder information, facilitating the modeling and exchange of financial data. This ontology is applicable in financial reporting, investment analysis, regulatory compliance, and risk assessment.
